summary: A simple SkyRe patch for the Triss Armor by Psyke23 and oldholo. It should also fix NPC\'s thinking you have no clothes/armour equipped.
descriptionHtml:
A simple SkyRe patch for the Triss Armor by Psyke23 and oldholo. It requires you to have the Triss Armor installed. The studded versions have similar stats to the vanilla leather armour in SkyRe. It should also fix NPC\'s thinking you have no clothes/armour equipped.


INSTALL
Just download the patch via NMM and when activating choose to overwrite any files. If you want to do a manual install, just extract the .rar contents to your skyrim installation folder and be sure to merge and overwrite the contents.

Thanks for downloading,

mrkurt48
author: mrkurt48
